content: a moment with muriel is a rectangular prayer shawl with a twist on the traditional knit 3 purl 3 pattern it is named for muriel my mom a prolific knitter who has created hundreds of shawls brightening the lives of many yarn - 800 yards of a bulky yarn preferably easy care 6 skeins of plymouth encore bulky worsted weight yarn can be held double needles - us size 10 5 optional - two stitch markers pattern can be made wider by adding stitches in increments of 6 optional add a stitch marker after first 4 and before last 4 stitches to delineate garter stitch border
